caption.p: Optical density of bacterial biofilm in S. aureus ATCC 6538 and S. aureus isolated from food, treated with OEPA and carvacrol in varying concentrations (0.062, 0.125, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2 and 4 mg mL −1). ANOVA, followed by Student-Newman-Keulstest *** p < 0.001 vs. all variables.*SA: Staphylococcus aureus. NC: negative control
